sentences.en: But even Dave knows that only politicians and celebrities transfer football allegiance.
sentences.cn: 但甚至达夫也知道,只有政治家和名人才会在俱乐部之间变来变去.

sentences.en: FBI demands its employees absolute allegiance to this bureau.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局要求其雇员对该局绝对忠诚.

sentences.en: He swore allegiance to the throne.
His allegiance has never been questioned.
sentences.cn: 他的忠心是毫无疑问的.

sentences.en: Many towns often found it politic to change their allegiance.
sentences.cn: 很多城镇经常发现改变他们的忠诚度是件精明的举动.

sentences.en: My allegiance to Kendall and his company ran deep.
sentences.cn: 我对肯德尔及其公司的忠诚加深了。

sentences.en: Name one promise you make when you say the Oath of Allegiance.
sentences.cn: 问:举出一项在宣读效忠誓词时提出的保证.

sentences.en: Soldiers must swear allegiance to the King.
sentences.cn: 战士们必须对国王宣誓效忠.

sentences.en: The constitution requires members of parliament to take an oath of allegiance.
sentences.cn: 宪法规定，议员必须宣誓效忠。

sentences.en: The people here have strong political allegiances .
sentences.cn: 这里的民众政治忠诚度很高。

sentences.en: The police are the only civil servants who have to swear allegiance to the Crown.
sentences.cn: 警察是唯一要宣誓效忠君主的公务员。

sentences.en: The soldiers swore allegiance to the order of their commander.
sentences.cn: 士兵宣誓忠实地执行司令的命令.

sentences.en: Their marketing manager switched allegiance from the company to their main competitor.
sentences.cn: 他们的销售经理已不再效忠公司,而投靠了公司的主要对手.

sentences.en: They have sworn ( an oath of ) allegiance to the crown.
sentences.cn: 他们 宣誓 效忠君主.

sentences.en: This success enabled him to claim the allegiance of central Burma.
sentences.cn: 这一胜利使他得以要求缅甸中部归顺于他.

sentences.en: We all had to pledge allegiance to the flag.
sentences.cn: 我们大家都得发誓忠于这面旗帜.

trans.tran_cn: 忠诚，拥护，（封建）臣道，忠节
trans.tran_en: loyalty to a leader, country, belief etc
